text: I yeshcho Iblis skazal: "Soobshchi mne, o Gospodi, o tom, kogo Ty pochtil bol'she, chem menya, povelev mne poklonit'sya yemu. Pochemu Ty pochtil yego bol'she menya, v to vremya kak ya luchshe nego? Klyanus', yesli Ty otlozhish' moy prednaznachennyy den' do Dnya voskreseniya, ya pogublyu yego potomkov soblaznom i obol'shcheniyem, krome nemnogikh iz nikh, kotorykh Ty oberegayesh' ot zla i zashchishchayesh' ot porokov
